question: Which among the following statement is not correct about Rapids?
option1: They are sections of a river where the river bed has a relatively steep gradient
option2: River rafting sports are carried out where many rapids are present in the course.
option3: They cause a decrease in the water velocity and turbulence
option4: Rapids cause water aeration of the stream or river resulting in better water quality.
answer: They cause a decrease in the water velocity and turbulence
explanation: rapids are sections of a river bed having relatively steep gradient. They cause an increase in the velocity and turbulence of the water. They cause water aeration of the stream thereby turning it in better quality. Rapids are famous for river rafting sports.
